snippet: Marc Gold published a homemade newsletter throughout the Mets’ inaugural season of 1962 as they slogged their way to a 40-120 record.
abstract: Cheering Section column; Marc Gold published a homemade newsletter throughout the New York Mets inaugural season of 1962 as they slogged their way to a 40-120 record.
lead_paragraph: Marc Gold published a homemade newsletter throughout the Mets’ inaugural season of 1962 as they slogged their way to a 40-120 record.

headline.seo: Following the Inept Mets of 1962 With a Newsletter
headline.main: Harboring Dreams of a Winner, Then Loving a Loser Anyway
